entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
